hopobject.name: android
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.0.5) Gecko/2008121622 Ubuntu/8.10 (intrepid) Firefox/3.0.5
hopobject.body:
Android platform is a software stack for mobile devices including an operating system, middleware and key applications.
Android port for Beagle Board was announce by Embinux Team. Current release supports input devices (keyboard/mouse), network and sound.
hopobject.shortdesc: The Open Handset Alliance (with Google) Android mobile phone operating system based on Linux on the Beagle Board
